sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Blog = ({post}) => { const image = "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQKDiswMiDfmxna3cGMdQ4EOrcHhz4VK1mEEw&s" const author = "Rishab Bibhuty" const content = "The ongoing Russo-Ukrainian War began in February 2014. Following Ukraine's Revolution of Dignity, Russia occupied and annexed Crimea from Ukraine and supported pro-Russian separatists fighting the Ukrainian military in the Donbas War. These first eight years of conflict also included naval incidents and cyberwarfare" const title = "Russia-ukraine war" return (

{post.title}

By {post.username} on {new Date(post.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

{content}

); } export default Blog
